attributes.action: review the decision made to close our local childcare provision at Coquet Children's Centre, Hadston, Northumberland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A decision has been made to close our local children's centre (Hadston in Northumberland), which includes nursery education, wrap around school care and holiday care.  A parents committee has been formed to fight this closure in July 2009, of this vital provision for children in the area and to save the jobs of those employed at the centre.
